section.title: /checks/set/
section.para: This call accepts a document describing a check. That check is instantiated with the checkid specified in the URL. If the check exists, but is not under the provided optional path a HTTP 403 code is returned. If the check already exists under the specified path, the check is updated to reflect the new configuration. The module cannot be changed for existing checks. All other fields can be changed. All fields are required except the disable field; if disable is omitted, it will inherit the disable attribute from parents in the tree (use the default setting).
